body_html:
@skye, unfortunately keyword arguments don't help. I am accessing conv_transpose in exactly the same way as I access standard conv2d layers. The conv_transpose throw the above error, though.

EDIT: The error goes away if you set the weights_initializer = None and bias_initializer=None in the conv_transpose function.

body:
@skye, unfortunately keyword arguments don't help. I am accessing conv_transpose in exactly the same way as I access standard conv2d layers. The conv_transpose throw the above error, though. 

EDIT: The error goes away if you set the weights_initializer = None and bias_initializer=None in the conv_transpose function.
